posts.post_title: A few very nice 1911 Obaks available....now accepting offers!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen

All cards are very nice with mostly sharp corners, very little wear and no creasing or wrinkling. Backs are clean and damage free. Prices listed below include shipping/insurance.



t212 1911 Obak O'Rourke PSA 3 - $75

t212 1911 Obak Lamline PSA 4 - $115

t212 1911 Obak Dillon PSA 4 - $115



Thanks in advance!
